professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in database administration, software development, and project management. Proficient in various tools and methodologies to drive efficient system performance and process optimization.

key_responsibilities: Configured and implemented disaster recovery processes for mission-critical databases.
Upgraded over 20 SQL servers within a four-month period.
Improved processing jobs by reducing duration by 80%.
Developed strategies to maintain smooth workflow on AWS platform.
Monitored and controlled job cost process
Applied SDLC methodologies to implement a faster billing process on Azure platform.
Managed merchandising products and billing tracking using Mainframe.
Rigorous vendor selection process landed with cloud-based solutions.
Ensured all departments were informed about project requirements through daily meetings.
Created a prospective client database for business targeting.
Developed strategies to optimize system performance and process.
Provided technical support for software development projects.
Assisted in the implementation of various IT solutions.

additional_information.achievements: Reduced process duration by 80% through optimized workflow strategies.
